title: 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Feb 22, 2026 @ 2:04 PM
content:
# 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Sunday, February 22, 2026 @ 2:04 PM EST

## CRITICAL ALERTS

### 🔴 MILITARY — Congress to Vote on Iran Strike Authorization
**Source:** Reuters  
**Details:** The U.S. Congress could vote as soon as next week on whether to block President Donald Trump's ability to strike Iran without lawmakers' approval, as the U.S. military prepares for a potential serious conflict with Iran if diplomatic efforts fail.  
**Market Impact:** Defense stocks could rally (LMT, NOC, RTX), oil volatility expected (USO, XLE), safe-haven flows (GLD, TLT)  
**URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

---

## IMPORTANT ALERTS

### 🟠 TRADE — Supreme Court Overturns Trump's Emergency Tariffs
**Source:** Reuters  
**Details:** Thousands of businesses won a hard-fought victory when the U.S. Supreme Court ruled to overturn the White House's emergency tariffs. The process of getting refunds has only just begun.  
**Market Impact:** Major win for importers, retailers (WMT, TGT, COST), manufacturing supply chains. Tariff relief could ease inflation pressure.  
**URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

### 🟠 POLICY — Trump Admin Proposes Multi-Year Pause on Asylum Work Permits
**Source:** Reuters  
**Details:** Work permits for asylum applicants could be paused for 'many years' under a proposed rule published by Trump's administration on Friday, marking one of the most sweeping changes to asylum-seeker employment authorization in decades.  
**Market Impact:** Labor market tightening possible, industries relying on immigrant labor (agriculture, hospitality, construction) could see wage pressure.  
**URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

---

## NOTABLE ALERTS

### 🟡 SOCIAL — Trump Attacks Supreme Court Justices Over Tariff Ruling
**Source:** Reuters  
**Details:** Trump lashed out against the Supreme Court justices, including two he appointed, in remarkably personal terms. He called the justices "very unpatriotic and disloyal to our Constitution" following their ruling against his emergency tariffs.  
**Market Impact:** Constitutional crisis rhetoric, market uncertainty around rule of law, potential volatility in judiciary-dependent sectors.  
**URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

### 🟡 POLICY — Historic Tariff Implementation from April 2025
**Source:** Fox News  
**Details:** In April 2025, Trump unveiled a series of historic tariffs during a "Make America Wealthy Again" event at the White House's Rose Garden on "Liberation Day." Tariffs imposed on goods from Mexico, Canada, China, and other countries to bring manufacturing jobs back to the U.S.  
**Market Impact:** Ongoing tariff regime despite Supreme Court ruling, trade war continues, manufacturing sector mixed (winners: domestic producers, losers: importers).  
**URL:** https://www.foxnews.com/category/person/donald-trump

---

## ADDITIONAL CONTEXT

### 🔵 INFO — Government Shutdown Impact on GDP
**Source:** Reuters  
**Details:** Most of the drag on GDP from the 43-day shutdown will likely be reversed in the first quarter of 2026.  
**Market Impact:** Economic recovery expected Q1, GDP bounce-back could support equity markets.  
**URL:** https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

---

## SCAN LIMITATIONS
- **Web Search API:** Not configured (Brave API key missing)
- **Truth Social:** Unable to access (requires JavaScript rendering)
- **Twitter/X:** Unable to scrape directly (blocking/rate limits)
- **Bloomberg, WSJ, Politico:** 403 Forbidden / Cloudflare blocks

## RECOMMENDATIONS
1. Configure Brave Search API key for comprehensive scanning
2. Set up Truth Social monitoring via RSS aggregator or API
3. Use Twitter API for @realDonaldTrump feed monitoring
4. Consider paid news API (NewsAPI, Alpaca News API) for real-time alerts

---

**Next Scan:** 2 hours (4:04 PM EST)
